data.prayer: Father, for those with enemies and who are afraid in Pontevedra, call them into your shelter and safety today.
data.verse: For you have been a refuge for me, a strong tower from the enemy.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Pontevedra, Galicia, Spain
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, knowing that teachers will be judged more strictly, help the local leaders in Pontevedra, Galicia, Spain to be careful with their words.
data.verse: Not many of you should become teachers, my brothers, for you know that we who teach will be judged with greater strictness.

data.section_summary: On average, 74 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in Pontevedra, Galicia, Spain.
data.prayer: Spirit, reveal yourself to these new families.
Spirit, help the church in the county of Pontevedra to exponentially multiply disciples.
Spirit, cause the 15,369 believers in Pontevedra to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Redondela
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Redondela, Galicia, Spain.
Father, please send teachers of your Word in Pontevedra who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.
God, we pray for the believers in Pontevedra, Galicia, Spain to be generous so that they would be worthy of greater investment by you.
Lord, please make the same Spirit that raised Jesus from the dead give life to those who are called by his name in the county of Pontevedra.
data.verse: But if the Spirit of him who raised up Jesus from the dead dwells in you, he who raised up Christ Jesus from the dead will also give life to your mortal bodies through his Spirit who dwells in you.

location.name: Pontevedra
location.cities_list: Vigo, Pontevedra, Vilagarcía de Arousa, Redondela, Ribeira
